headline: Systems Assurance Manager at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Accomplished project manager with experience in corporate strategy, account management, human resources, and R&D terrains. Demonstrated track record of strong task execution, project and technical management, client and vendor relationship development, and new process implementation. Posses firm work ethic, commitment to client service, professional demeanor, and the ability to work as part of a team.

Specialties: Web Development, Project Management, Proposal Development, Document Management,  Product Management, Root Cause Analysis, Task Analysis, Vendor Relationship Management, Strategic Planning, Risk Assessment, Resource Management, Internet Data Collection, Quantitative Analysis, Internet Security, Statistical Reporting, Relational Database Management, Client Relations

positions.description:
- Manage 15-20 concurrent tech eng & ops projects for DHS
- Create and maintain integrated project schedule for entire development lifecycle from inception to final deployment 
- Facilitate stakeholder meetings and SDLC gate/checkpoint reviews. 
- Author/manage creation of PM Plans,  Comm Plans, Deployment Plans, and other PM documentation 
- Primary point of contact throughout entire SDLC process; act as liaison b/w project teams, requirements analysts, design & development teams, functional & performance test teams, and production support teams 
- Coordinate efforts of team across entire SDLC spectrum to ensure IT projects stay on schedule and meet standards for architecture integrity, security, and performance 
- Assure proper planning, requirements gathering, management, coordination, and execution of end-to-end SDLC; coordinate w/Subject Matter Experts to assess project plans, requirements, design, test results, training and help desk strategies, and deployment readiness
positions.title: Project Manager

positions.description:
- Responsible for both the project and operational management of a portfolio of Fortune 1000 clients and government sector clients through the membership lifecycle and developing and maintaining strong member relationships
- Lead clients through Web-Based Dashboard Implementation and Production Data Refresh Development cycles
- Work closely with private and government sector client while partnering. with client's Project Manager also work closely with the Technical Team to ensure each client has an accurate dashboard, published as per agreed expectations 
- Ensure core project management principles are applied to project execution including scope, risk and quality management
- Support onsite member kickoff meetings and/or year-end member strategic reviews
- Work on internal process improvement initiatives to develop program infrastructure and streamline processes
positions.title: Associate Project Manager / Project Management Analyst
